item.title: Get started
item.description: Install TerraformTerraform ships as a single binary file. The examples below include installation information for popular operating systems. For official instructions on installing Terraform, refer to Install Terraform External link icon Open external link . ​‚Äã Mac The easiest way to install Terraform on macOS is with Homebrew. $ brew install terraform ==> Downloading https://homebrew.bintray.com/bottles/terraform-0.11.6.sierra.bottle.tar.gz ######################################################################## 100.0% ==> Pouring terraform-0.11.6.sierra.bottle.tar.gz üç∫ /usr/local/Cellar/terraform/0.11.6: 6 files, 80.2MB $ terraform version Terraform v0.
